title: Project Yi's strikes might be a bit too silent
body:
I know you can turn up the sound and all but in general Project Yi's strikes can barely be heard in the heat of the moment.
I've seen several complaints about it, what does anyone else think? perhaps they could be turned up a bit so we'd be able to distinguish when to reset our AA with W for example?

replies.body:
Hello! 

We're currently working on a bug where Double Strike (passive) isn't playing the SFX for its second strike. This may be why the strikes sound a bit lackluster. 

We have turned up the volume on these attacks while the content was on PBE, but we can take a second look at the audio.
Thank you very much, Perhaps the second passive auto attack might be the problem indeed, thanks for checking!
No worries! We're hoping to have this resolved next patch! Take a look and if you still feel it's not right, lemme know! :]

Is it right that most of Yi's move and attack sfx' are very silent, while certain others are loud and clear?
Most of the times it is as if he whispers... everything else works fine though.
